english.segment1: Static night, I'll be leaving soon. It won't be long, no it won't be long. Cause I'm wearing out under nowhere's moon. It won't be long, no it won't be long. Until I see the sun splash up the night sky. And call it out to turn the planet new
english.segment2: So goodnight gravity. It has kept me down. But I always get just one more try. I always get just one more try
english.segment3: Space between, there is such a divide. It won't be long, no it won't be long. Cause honestly there's a storm inside. It won't be long, no it won't be long. Cause honestly there's a storm inside. It won't be long, no it won't be long
english.segment4: And in the morning I will find my heart. And in the morning I will find my heart
